analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x8716fc5da009d3a208f0178b637a50f4ef42400f.sol:
	Contract Ustock has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x8716fc5da009d3a208f0178b637a50f4ef42400f.sol#295)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
